description:
## ARIA

If the progress bar is describing the loading progress of a particular region of a page,
you should use `aria-describedby` to point to the progress bar, and set the `aria-busy`
attribute to `true` on that region until it has finished loading.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propColor: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.
propValue:
The value of the progress indicator for the determinate and buffer variants.
Value between 0 and 100.
propValueBuffer:
The value for the buffer variant.
Value between 0 and 100.
propVariant:
The variant to use.
Use indeterminate or query when there is no progress value.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesColorPrimary: Styles applied to the root and bar2 element if `color="primary"`; bar2 if `variant="buffer"`.
stylesColorSecondary: Styles applied to the root and bar2 elements if `color="secondary"`; bar2 if `variant="buffer"`.
stylesDeterminate: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="determinate"`.
stylesIndeterminate: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="indeterminate"`.
stylesBuffer: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="buffer"`.
stylesQuery: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="query"`.
stylesDashed: Styles applied to the additional bar element if `variant="buffer"`.
stylesDashedColorPrimary: Styles applied to the additional bar element if `variant="buffer"` and `color="primary"`.
stylesDashedColorSecondary: Styles applied to the additional bar element if `variant="buffer"` and `color="secondary"`.
stylesBar: Styles applied to the layered bar1 and bar2 elements.
stylesBarColorPrimary: Styles applied to the bar elements if `color="primary"`; bar2 if `variant` not "buffer".
stylesBarColorSecondary: Styles applied to the bar elements if `color="secondary"`; bar2 if `variant` not "buffer".
stylesBar1Indeterminate: Styles applied to the bar1 element if `variant="indeterminate or query"`.
stylesBar1Determinate: Styles applied to the bar1 element if `variant="determinate"`.
stylesBar1Buffer: Styles applied to the bar1 element if `variant="buffer"`.
stylesBar2Indeterminate: Styles applied to the bar2 element if `variant="indeterminate or query"`.
stylesBar2Buffer: Styles applied to the bar2 element if `variant="buffer"`.
